website_summaries.verdict: This eyelash curler works with virtually anything you can put on your eyes – from false and mink eyelashes to extensions.
pros: Curls natural lashes, false lashes, mink eyelashes, and extensions
Uses heated comb and mascara to create long-lasting curls
No tugging, pulling, or broken lashes
Also works with Asian eye shapes
cons: Takes a long time to heat up

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third heated eyelash curler I have bought. This one is rechargeable, which is awesome. The other ones I have go through batteries atleast once a week, and they really only work good for 2 uses, then they just barely curl. This one is a lot hotter, and it stays hot for about 5 days. I have natural lashes and they are pretty long, it's hard to keep a good curl to them, but this curler seems to help keep a curl all day. If you are considering a heated lash curler, you will not be disappointed if you get this one.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieF

customer_reviews.title: Too slow for me.
customer_reviews.text: Works but it's a pain to use. It does give your lashes a much more natural look--no crimped lashes. Downside is that it takes a long time to heat up and a long time to actually get a curve in your lashes. I've defaulted to a regular crimper that I heat up for 2 seconds with my hair dryer. Tried and true, and fast. I might use this one for special occasions when I have lots of prep time.
customer_reviews.author: Curiosity

customer_reviews.title: Separated for the spider eye look
customer_reviews.text: I think it works for sure but only after applying mascara. Also it then kinda makes the lashes clump and point like the edges of the heated head. The lashes are kinda too far apart and makes the spider legs look. Japonesque had more curl less decision of lashes. I’m does work tho. And I do like that it’s rechargeable and looks very sturdy. I will keep it as I don’t want to go throu the hassle. But wished it didn’t separate the lashes so much. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Vaiamassage

customer_reviews.title: works well, curl fast and battery holds a long time
customer_reviews.text: I only need to curl my lash a few times a week and a fully charged curler lasted me a month without charging. My lashes are thick and straight, so I found the "green" light (hotter rod) curl better and faster. It definitely works better with mascara, but the down side is the mascara tends to stick on the rod after awhile and is difficult to clean - a problem with any curler though. Overall, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: SarahHR

customer_reviews.title: Work on long lashes.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by how well this works. Easy to hold, use and carrry along in my purse. It gets warm enough to create a curl in my falsies by just holding the wand against it. Won’t curl short natural lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this heated eyelash curler!
customer_reviews.text: This eyelash curler gets very warm and doesn’t require multiple passes to get a nice curl. I’ve recently had eyelash extensions removed and am using mascara again to give my lashes a break. This curler helps get that nice curl I miss from having extensions.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tolton

customer_reviews.title: Heated Eyelash Curler
customer_reviews.text: Really love this eyelash curler! The old type of eyelash curler would pull out my lashes, but this one heats up the lashes and keeps them curled all day. I would surely recommend this product for anyone who likes their eyelashes curled quickly and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Hebert

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. Does not curl my eyelashes. My lashes are very straight and do not hold a curl using a traditional eyelash curler. This little gizmo is time consuming and does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how gentle it is on your lashes! Don’t like that there really isn’t any warning that the battery needs charged. You turn it on one day, it shows green then blinks red and turns off and you have no curler!
customer_reviews.author: Amy L Cook

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Heats fast. Compact size.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Heats up FAST. No more pinching myself with the old clamp style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product however, it just didn't work as expected. It curls your lashes but they go back to straight after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: epicrecipe

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: The curler doesn’t get hot enough to curl my lashes. The cover/cap comes off too easily when traveling. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Chasse

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried it a few times but made my lashes clumped up.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Osman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love! Have always had trouble getting my lashes to curl and stay curled.This really works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Charged it fully as directed but it would never heat at all.
customer_reviews.author: LDT

customer_reviews.title: it doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: There is no clamp for it to curl the eyelash so it doesn't curl well so I do not recommend any wand product. Instead: I recommend you, the reviewer, look at something like the Mirenesse curler which is a normal eyelash curler but with heated clampers; There are some expensive products that work the same but this is the one i ended up with because of cost. Honestly though? Go get yourself an eyelash lift and tint. It will change your world.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: only curls after applying masacra
customer_reviews.text: I just used this once so I can not say how long this will last. but here are some pros and cons. This is convenient as to recharge the unit instead of changing batteries. The temp is warm not too hot so there is no real damage on your lashes. It takes up to 1 min to warm up to the lower temp setting. You have to put mascara before applying the heating device. and it takes around 1 min for each eye to make it curly. It does curl naturally instead of a weird angle like some metal eyelash curler does.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Effective curler
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of practice but you can really get a pretty curl. Also as others have said it is time consuming, but one of the most effective ways to spend time for makeup application.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s works great. My eyelashes are straight and this puts a nice curl to them. You have to learn what heat level to use. The highest tends to be too hot for me. It tends to heat up the mascara and your lashes stick together. I can go almost 2 weeks without charging.
customer_reviews.author: Seder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use the higher heat setting to get a good curl that lasts just about all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T Heat up
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order an eyelash curler that charges through a USB. I followed all the charging instructions as outlined in the manual. This curler barley even gets warm to the touch and is useless to curl eyelashes. I'll be returning...
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Then I bought the Chella and love it.
customer_reviews.text: this one didn't work for me. I think it just didn't get hot enough. Then I bought the Chella and love it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. It helps separates the lashes and melts the excess mascara you may have added. Luckily I bought two. I lost one on a recent trip. Mine are about 5-6 years old battery operated. A recharable one is next on my list
customer_reviews.author: Paper Artist

product_meta.title: Heated Eyelash Curler with Comb Design LED Light, Electric Eyelash Curler (Black)
